label: ⛓️ Authoritarian Ties
definition: Company has significant ties to authoritarian regimes, potentially enabling surveillance, censorship, or human rights violations.

criteria.description: Operations or ownership in countries rated 'Not Free' by Freedom House
Evidence of compliance with authoritarian censorship demands
Technology or services used for political repression

counterCriteria: Company has withdrawn from authoritarian markets
